ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISCHANGED(Status__c) || ISNEW()) && (ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Complete - Paid') || ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Complete - Bill to Loan')) && TEXT(Property__r.Deal__r.Interest_Rate_Type__c) = 'Fixed' && ISBLANK(Modified_Interest_Rate__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Modified Interest Rate is required when the associated deal's Interest Rate Type is 'Fixed' and the Status is changed to Complete - Paid or Complete - Bill to Loan.
